timeline.message: Fix Kotlin compiler warnings in buildSrc
Fix Kotlin compiler warning in test code

timeline.bodyText: We didn't mean for the default constructor to be public, did we?
timeline.author: marcphilipp

replies.bodyText:
I do not recall properly, whether this was intentional.
In hindsight, it seems to be an accident rather than explicitly designed this way.
replies.author: mmerdes

timeline.bodyText: I assume that this constructor is needed by -Werror, right?
timeline.author: jbduncan

replies.bodyText: Yes, due to newly introduced warnings like these: https://ge.junit.org/s/aohc47ea6wfk6/console-log?task=:junit-jupiter:compileModule
replies.author: marcphilipp
